entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 9.0°C
